recipe_name: Spiced lamb with garlic, honey, red pepper dressing and herb salad
author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a small frying pan and sauté the red pepper for 6-8 minutes or until soft. Add the garlic and fry for one minute. Stir in the honey then put the mixture into a blender or food processor and liquidise until smooth. Strain through a sieve and cool. For the lamb, drizzle the lamb steak with oil and sprinkle over the paprika and chilli flakes. Heat a griddle pan until hot, then fry the steak for 4-5 minutes on each side or until cooked as desired.  Rest for five minutes. Arrange the herbs on a plate and drizzle the dressing around the edge. Serve with the lamb steak.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red pepper, deseeded, chopped,  3 garlic cloves, crushed,  1 tbsp honey,  1 lamb steak,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp paprika,  1 tsp chilli flakes,  handful flatleaf parsley, ,  handful basil leaves, ,  handful chervil ,  handful mint
